document_data.name: Arctigis
document_data.mainbody: '''Arctigis''' was a [[white dragon]] servant of [[Zhengyi]] in [[Vaasa]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.History:
Zhengyi subdued Arctigis centuries before when the wizard was still a living being.

In 1357 DR, Arctigis was protecting the walls of [[Castle Perilous]] when [[Gareth Dragonsbane]] and his party infiltrated the castle.
document_data.Personality: Arctigis was a cruel and vicious being, who loved tormenting the weak. He truly enjoyed making illusions that had a captive believe they had the possibility of escape and then snatching that hope away. However, Arctigis had learned to be cautious in approaching powerful enemies.
document_data.Relationship: In his twisted way, Arctigis loved Zhengyi and he would do anything to avenge his death, not caring for his own safety.
